title: Finance Intern (Summer 2016: End of May-September) - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Finance Intern (Summer 2016: End of May-September) Sports Management Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsibilities would include cost analysis, financial statement reviews, assisting with the internal controls of the company and event time finance activities.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
